SELECT bno, category, title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_date, edit_date FROM board WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(category, title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_date) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tag}, 0, #{reg_id}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, tag = #{tag}, edit_date = now() WHERE bno=#{bno}
UPDATE board SET view_cnt = view_cnt+1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
